body.name: Bloch unisex-adult Adult Soft Stretch Reusable Face Mask With Lanyard and Moldable Nose Pad (Pack of 3)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 7 hrs 59 mins
features: Care instructions Machine Wash, Air Dry
Convenient lanyard keeps the mask safely around your neck
Two layers of breathable soft stretch fabric
Adjustable stoppers for ear loops, Moldable nose pad
Washable and reusable, without harmful chemicals going into the environment
body.description: The Bloch A004 Soft Stretch Reusable Face Mask with Lanyard and Moldable Nose Pad cleverly features a neck lanyard that allows you to keep your mask securely around your neck away from other surfaces. The super soft material is easy to breathe through and stretches to provide a comfortable, perfect fit that contours to your face. Dual layers of this top-quality fabric make the A004 Soft Stretch Reusable Face Mask ideal for all climates, all-day use, and perfect for wearing during movement and exercise. Effective in protecting against the elements of everyday urban life, the A004 Soft Stretch Reusable Face Mask features UV protection, anti-dust, and a lining to control odors. Adjustable ear loops and moldable nose pad ensure a snug fit to your face and reduce fogging on your glasses and sunglasses. Machine washable and environmentally friendly.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About us We are artisans within a beautiful, ever-changing field. We are happiest when engineering the perfect product to meet our dancer’s bespoke specifications and desires. We collaborate with some of the world’s best dancers and ex-professionals — including current BLOCH Ambassadors Jason Samuels Smith and Devon Teuscher to name a few. Our BLOCH Artists are some of the industry’s professional dancers and our Young Artists are some of world’s brightest upcoming stars of dance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My FAVORITE & THE BEST MASK I’ve tried yet!
reviews.reviewText: I don’t write reviews cuz they’re generally useless for many products, IMO, but I’m so stoked on these masks, I just gotta—I’ve tried a million masks in the past year and have tirelessly researched to find one thats protective, comfortable, and doesn’t irritate sensitive face skin and/or cause maskne. While there isn’t any proven technology for maskne, the top derms are recommending anti microbial, soft, breathable cotton materials that don’t work to cause excess “sweat” or what I like to call “breath fog” because that’s when acne and other bacterium to form and then our face skin just marinate in grossness. It also has amazing ADDED bonuses: environmentally friendly materials, 25% more UV protection than other materials, it’s comfortable AF, adjustable ear loops for many head/face sizes & preferences, reusable/machine washable, passes all CDC recommendations, looks cute AF, has a land yard for easy, convenient access, and best of all— it’s the only mask I can comfortably wear my sun/eye glasses with.Also recommend this mask for those that need to wear them while working out, for any activity where you’re hot, for long periods of time, for when you wanna look cute or professional but have to wear a mask, for days you’re constantly having to put on mask/take off mask, and/or struggle with acne or other face skin issues.*PLS NOTE: these masks only come in TWO universal sizes; adult and kid. I think they’ll fit comfortably for MOST, but not ALL. And obviously, NOTHING is universal, so the size + my above opinions are only mine. I will say, I’ve made my entire family buy these and everyone loves them as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for moving around
reviews.reviewText: This mask is great for Ballet and Tap. Breakdancing is a little tough because i'ts not easy to breathe heavy in. Stays on your face really well. It's a great shape for a petite face. Length is not very big so if you have a large nose or chin it may not fit well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty, soft, stretchy, well-fitting face covering. The nose wire molds very well and the elastic for the ears is comfortable; the comfortable elastic neck strap keeps it from getting lost when you aren't wearing it. Those are the good attributes.The two knocks it has against it are that it is so thin, regardless of how many layers there are, it probably isn't a lifesaver. When in position, your first breath through your nose draws the fabric into your nostrils. It was impossible to take a breath without that happening. Fortunately, I have been using the silicone cages because that bothers so much anyway. With the cage, it is fine. So, if you just need a mask for compliance sake, this will do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for men.
reviews.reviewText: Really for women, probably with a smallish face (if that makes sense). I tried it on, does'nt fit snugg and slide off of the nose, really defeating the purpose, actually, I think it would slide off the nose no matters who is wearing it. Good material, soft, just not a good "mask", to keep anything out, i.e. Covid, dust, etc......

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DOES NOT GO UNDER THE CHIN AS SHOWN IN PHOTOS
reviews.reviewText: This mask's description says the length from noise to chin is 15.16 cm or 5.97 in. The true measurement is 5.0 in. When VERY stretched it is 5.5 in. The point is the mask does not go under the chin AT ALL. It stops at the chin. Because it stops at the chin, it rides up as you wear it. This is supposed to be an adult size mask. My face is not large, nor do i have a double chin. There is NO excuse this mask shouldn't fit. DO NOT BUY THIS!! There is a no return policy on this purchase, that is why I closely checked the measurements given compared to measurements I took of my face. According to my measurement of my face, this mask should COMPLETELY cover my chin. Yes, the fabric is soft, but that doesn't matter if it doesn't fit. I am extremely disappointed and think Amazon should compensate me in some way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Mask and the Lanyard is an Excellent Feature
reviews.reviewText: Overall, I liked this product. I bought it specifically because of the lanyard as I am going to Disney World and didn't want to have to keep putting a mask away for outdoors and finding it again for indoors. I tried the mask out around town before my trip and found it to work great. It is easy to slip on and off and it is soft so you don't notice it around your neck when you are not wearing it. It fits me very well and I would consider me an average size adult.Breathability seems fine, no better or worse than other masks I've had. The mask is a soft cloth material but I really didn't have any issues I've seen mentioned with it being pulled into my mouth when breathing hard.Overall, this is a great product for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars To small for big guys
reviews.reviewText: This mask is great for a female or slender man's face, but I find it (a larger guy) to be too small. I do like the lanyard feature and the fit around the ears isn't bad but would have (after a long day of wearing one) benefitted from some ear protection from the constant rubbing. The fit was too tight for me, but my wife loved them.
No me tapa para protegerme bien. Muy mal hecho, lo único que me gustó fue el color
Es un cubrebocas muy cómodo, se ajusta perfecto y la tela muy suave.
Received a cheap Knock off with No tags and very cheap material

By far and away the worst mask I’ve ever worn. Why would you make the joins of material over the Center of the mask. (So you end with 4 layers of material over the mouth) hardest mask to breath through I have ever used. Add on top you say washable and first wash all the metal bands in nose pop through the material. (I have other masks with metal and no issue at all) yes feels soft on face but that’s about the nicest thing I could say. How did it get so many positive review?!
